desc: SwapNames: Substitute the name of the person referred to in the sentence.

examples.ori: Ann asked Mary what time the library closes, but she had forgotten.
examples.trans: Emily asked Amy what time the library closes, but she had forgotten.

examples.ori: Sam's drawing was hung just above Tina's and it did look much better with another one below it.
examples.trans: Arthur's drawing was hung just above molly's and   it did look much better with another one below it .
